titleStmt.title: The English rogue continued in the life of Meriton Latroon, and other extravangants comprehending the most eminent cheats of most trades professions. The second part. Licensed Feb. 22. 1669
English rogue. Part 2.
titleStmt.author: Head, Richard, 1637?-1686?

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Francis Kirkman, and are to be sold by William Rands in Duck-lane,

notesStmt.note: By Richard Head. A work of fiction based upon his early life.
Running title reads: The English rogue, and other extravagants.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
